summary: A perkable spell framework and spell samples.
descriptionHtml:
DO NOT PUBLISH - FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY

7 spells total x5 perk each. Not all perks work as of right now and the descriptions are inaccurate. Some visuals need work. Balancing need work. Still, everything is testable in game.

To obtain the spells, type in console: "setstage aor_config 1"
To grant the PC 1 perk to every spells, type in console: "setstage aor_config 2" (can be done multiple times)
Perk can be selected in the config menu.
author: BralorMarr
